plot: A man spends a good portion of his life imprisoned for steeling a piece of bread, but upon his release, puts himself in the service of the people.
title: Jean Valjean
plot_es: A man spends a good portion of his life imprisoned for steeling a piece of bread, but upon his release, puts himself in the service of the people.
plot_en: A man spends a good portion of his life imprisoned for steeling a piece of bread, but upon his release, puts himself in the service of the people.
